definitions.definition: To hear ( intentionally ) a conversation one is not intended to hear; to listen in .
examples: I hope nobody was eavesdropping on our conversation last night, since it got so personal.

definitions.definition: To listen for another organism 's calls , so as to exploit them.

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) To hear ( intentionally ) a conversation one is not intended to hear; to listen in .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) To listen for another organism 's calls , so as to exploit them.
